scenes.background: [Monica] glances at [Bob], who looks exasperated after reading your message.
scenes.description: 'This is really important. Are you absolutely sure you can't help us out just this once?'

options.text: I'll briefly assist, but I can't commit to a full review.
options.analysis: You offered partial help, displaying a balanced approach but no strong inclination toward any specific emotional intelligence dimension.

options.text: I understand the urgency, but I need to respect my leave. You'll have to manage.
options.analysis: You maintained your boundaries, showing strong self-regulation, but lower empathy and motivation to assist.

options.text: Alright, I'll take a quick look and give you my thoughts.
options.analysis: You decided to help despite being on leave, demonstrating strong empathy and social skills but lower self-regulation.
